mapper.sql: t.COMPANYID, t.COMPANYNAME, t.COMPSHORTNAME, t.COMPANYTYPE, t.AREAID, t.REGADDRESS, t.ADDRESSID, t.ADDRESS, t.ZIPCODE, t.COMPANYTEL, t.FAX, t.FIXFUND, t.LAWER, t.LAWERIDCARD, t.LAWEREMAIL, t.LAWERMOBILEPHONE, t.MANDATARY, t.MANDATARYIDCARD, t.MOBILEPHONE, t.EMAIL, t.INTRODUCTION, t.LASTYEARINCOME, t.CHEMICALSRANK, t.CHINESEDRUGSRANKS, t.BIOLOGICALPRODUCTRANKS, t.WARRANTCODE, t.WARRANDATE, t.BUSINESSLICENCE, t.BUSINESSDATE, t.COMPANYCODE, t.CODEDATE, t.ISADEQUATESUPPLY, t.ISDISTRIBUTION, t.ISCRIME, t.COMPANYREGISTERID, t.ADDUSERID, t.ADDTIME, t.DISTRIBUTION, t.DISAREAID, t.LAWERJOB, t.LAWERCALL, t.REGCARDCOUNT, t.DRUGCOUNT, t.TPTALASSETS, t.FIXEDASSETS, t.GSPCODE, t.GSPENDTIME, t.ISSECULARLICENCE, t.ISJLY, t.ISBUSINESSLICENCE, t.ID, t.CREDITCODE, t.REPORTDATE, t.LASTYEARTOTAL, t.ISNWKT, t.ISPFT, t.COMPANYEMERGENCYTEL, t.VARIETYNUMBER, t.PRODUCTGAUGE, t.WINVARIETYNUMBER, t.WINPRODUCTGAUGE, t.WAREHOUSEAREA, t.ISWON, t.PICKINGSYSTEM, t.COMPUTERSYSTEM, t.INVENTORYSYSTEM, t.PLATFORMDOCKING, t.LASTYEARBUSINESSINCOME, t.VIOLATIONSTATEMENT, t.COMCRITICALTEL, t.MANDATARYCRITICALTEL, t.ISUSING, t.COMPANYCATEGORY, t.BUSINESSSCOPE, t.ISCREDITCODE, t.TRCID, t.BUSINESSLICENSEID, t.ISUSINGREASON, t.ISCHANGENAME, t.BEFORENAME, t.ISGENERALAGREEMENT, t.COMPANYIDOLD, t.COMPANYID_SC, t.COMPANYNAME_SC, t.BUSINESSLICENCEIMG, t.WARRANTIMG, t.AUTHORIZATIONIMG, t.GSPIMG, t.OTHERINFORMATION, t.ISFIVEONE, t.FIVECODE, t.ISSCDIS, t.NSSBH, t.ISYQ
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRADE_COMINFO( COMPANYID , COMPANYNAME , COMPSHORTNAME , COMPANYTYPE , AREAID , REGADDRESS , ADDRESSID , ADDRESS , ZIPCODE , COMPANYTEL , FAX , FIXFUND , LAWER , LAWERIDCARD , LAWEREMAIL , LAWERMOBILEPHONE , MANDATARY , MANDATARYIDCARD , MOBILEPHONE , EMAIL , INTRODUCTION , LASTYEARINCOME , CHEMICALSRANK , CHINESEDRUGSRANKS , BIOLOGICALPRODUCTRANKS , WARRANTCODE , WARRANDATE , BUSINESSLICENCE , BUSINESSDATE , COMPANYCODE , CODEDATE , ISADEQUATESUPPLY , ISDISTRIBUTION , ISCRIME , COMPANYREGISTERID , ADDUSERID , ADDTIME , DISTRIBUTION , DISAREAID , LAWERJOB , LAWERCALL , REGCARDCOUNT , DRUGCOUNT , TPTALASSETS , FIXEDASSETS , GSPCODE , GSPENDTIME , ISSECULARLICENCE , ISJLY , ISBUSINESSLICENCE , ID , CREDITCODE , REPORTDATE , LASTYEARTOTAL , ISNWKT , ISPFT , COMPANYEMERGENCYTEL , VARIETYNUMBER , PRODUCTGAUGE , WINVARIETYNUMBER , WINPRODUCTGAUGE , WAREHOUSEAREA , ISWON , PICKINGSYSTEM , COMPUTERSYSTEM , INVENTORYSYSTEM , PLATFORMDOCKING , LASTYEARBUSINESSINCOME , VIOLATIONSTATEMENT , COMCRITICALTEL , MANDATARYCRITICALTEL , ISUSING , COMPANYCATEGORY , BUSINESSSCOPE , ISCREDITCODE , TRCID , BUSINESSLICENSEID , ISUSINGREASON , ISCHANGENAME , BEFORENAME , ISGENERALAGREEMENT , COMPANYIDOLD , COMPANYID_SC , COMPANYNAME_SC , BUSINESSLICENCEIMG , WARRANTIMG , AUTHORIZATIONIMG , GSPIMG , OTHERINFORMATION , ISFIVEONE , FIVECODE , ISSCDIS , NSSBH , ISYQ ) VALUES ( #{companyid} , #{companyname} , #{compshortname} , #{companytype} , #{areaid} , #{regaddress} , #{addressid} , #{address} , #{zipcode} , #{companytel} , #{fax} , #{fixfund} , #{lawer} , #{laweridcard} , #{laweremail} , #{lawermobilephone} , #{mandatary} , #{mandataryidcard} , #{mobilephone} , #{email} , #{introduction} , #{lastyearincome} , #{chemicalsrank} , #{chinesedrugsranks} , #{biologicalproductranks} , #{warrantcode} , #{warrandate} , #{businesslicence} , #{businessdate} , #{companycode} , #{codedate} , #{isadequatesupply} , #{isdistribution} , #{iscrime} , #{companyregisterid} , #{adduserid} , #{addtime} , #{distribution} , #{disareaid} , #{lawerjob} , #{lawercall} , #{regcardcount} , #{drugcount} , #{tptalassets} , #{fixedassets} , #{gspcode} , #{gspendtime} , #{issecularlicence} , #{isjly} , #{isbusinesslicence} , #{id} , #{creditcode} , #{reportdate} , #{lastyeartotal} , #{isnwkt} , #{ispft} , #{companyemergencytel} , #{varietynumber} , #{productgauge} , #{winvarietynumber} , #{winproductgauge} , #{warehousearea} , #{iswon} , #{pickingsystem} , #{computersystem} , #{inventorysystem} , #{platformdocking} , #{lastyearbusinessincome} , #{violationstatement} , #{comcriticaltel} , #{mandatarycriticaltel} , #{isusing} , #{companycategory} , #{businessscope} , #{iscreditcode} , #{trcid} , #{businesslicenseid} , #{isusingreason} , #{ischangename} , #{beforename} , #{isgeneralagreement} , #{companyidold} , #{companyidSc} , #{companynameSc} , #{businesslicenceimg} , #{warrantimg} , #{authorizationimg} , #{gspimg} , #{otherinformation} , #{isfiveone} , #{fivecode} , #{isscdis} , #{nssbh} , #{isyq} )

INSERT INTO TRADE_COMINFO ( COMPANYID , COMPANYNAME , COMPSHORTNAME , COMPANYTYPE , AREAID , REGADDRESS , ADDRESSID , ADDRESS , ZIPCODE , COMPANYTEL , FAX , FIXFUND , LAWER , LAWERIDCARD , LAWEREMAIL , LAWERMOBILEPHONE , MANDATARY , MANDATARYIDCARD , MOBILEPHONE , EMAIL , INTRODUCTION , LASTYEARINCOME , CHEMICALSRANK , CHINESEDRUGSRANKS , BIOLOGICALPRODUCTRANKS , WARRANTCODE , WARRANDATE , BUSINESSLICENCE , BUSINESSDATE , COMPANYCODE , CODEDATE , ISADEQUATESUPPLY , ISDISTRIBUTION , ISCRIME , COMPANYREGISTERID , ADDUSERID , ADDTIME , DISTRIBUTION , DISAREAID , LAWERJOB , LAWERCALL , REGCARDCOUNT , DRUGCOUNT , TPTALASSETS , FIXEDASSETS , GSPCODE , GSPENDTIME , ISSECULARLICENCE , ISJLY , ISBUSINESSLICENCE , ID , CREDITCODE , REPORTDATE , LASTYEARTOTAL , ISNWKT , ISPFT , COMPANYEMERGENCYTEL , VARIETYNUMBER , PRODUCTGAUGE , WINVARIETYNUMBER , WINPRODUCTGAUGE , WAREHOUSEAREA , ISWON , PICKINGSYSTEM , COMPUTERSYSTEM , INVENTORYSYSTEM , PLATFORMDOCKING , LASTYEARBUSINESSINCOME , VIOLATIONSTATEMENT , COMCRITICALTEL , MANDATARYCRITICALTEL , ISUSING , COMPANYCATEGORY , BUSINESSSCOPE , ISCREDITCODE , TRCID , BUSINESSLICENSEID , ISUSINGREASON , ISCHANGENAME , BEFORENAME , ISGENERALAGREEMENT , COMPANYIDOLD , COMPANYID_SC , COMPANYNAME_SC , BUSINESSLICENCEIMG , WARRANTIMG , AUTHORIZATIONIMG , GSPIMG , OTHERINFORMATION , ISFIVEONE , FIVECODE , ISSCDIS , NSSBH , ISYQ ) VALUES
( #{item.companyid}, #{item.companyname}, #{item.compshortname}, #{item.companytype}, #{item.areaid}, #{item.regaddress}, #{item.addressid}, #{item.address}, #{item.zipcode}, #{item.companytel}, #{item.fax}, #{item.fixfund}, #{item.lawer}, #{item.laweridcard}, #{item.laweremail}, #{item.lawermobilephone}, #{item.mandatary}, #{item.mandataryidcard}, #{item.mobilephone}, #{item.email}, #{item.introduction}, #{item.lastyearincome}, #{item.chemicalsrank}, #{item.chinesedrugsranks}, #{item.biologicalproductranks}, #{item.warrantcode}, #{item.warrandate}, #{item.businesslicence}, #{item.businessdate}, #{item.companycode}, #{item.codedate}, #{item.isadequatesupply}, #{item.isdistribution}, #{item.iscrime}, #{item.companyregisterid}, #{item.adduserid}, #{item.addtime}, #{item.distribution}, #{item.disareaid}, #{item.lawerjob}, #{item.lawercall}, #{item.regcardcount}, #{item.drugcount}, #{item.tptalassets}, #{item.fixedassets}, #{item.gspcode}, #{item.gspendtime}, #{item.issecularlicence}, #{item.isjly}, #{item.isbusinesslicence}, #{item.id}, #{item.creditcode}, #{item.reportdate}, #{item.lastyeartotal}, #{item.isnwkt}, #{item.ispft}, #{item.companyemergencytel}, #{item.varietynumber}, #{item.productgauge}, #{item.winvarietynumber}, #{item.winproductgauge}, #{item.warehousearea}, #{item.iswon}, #{item.pickingsystem}, #{item.computersystem}, #{item.inventorysystem}, #{item.platformdocking}, #{item.lastyearbusinessincome}, #{item.violationstatement}, #{item.comcriticaltel}, #{item.mandatarycriticaltel}, #{item.isusing}, #{item.companycategory}, #{item.businessscope}, #{item.iscreditcode}, #{item.trcid}, #{item.businesslicenseid}, #{item.isusingreason}, #{item.ischangename}, #{item.beforename}, #{item.isgeneralagreement}, #{item.companyidold}, #{item.companyidSc}, #{item.companynameSc}, #{item.businesslicenceimg}, #{item.warrantimg}, #{item.authorizationimg}, #{item.gspimg}, #{item.otherinformation}, #{item.isfiveone}, #{item.fivecode}, #{item.isscdis}, #{item.nssbh}, #{item.isyq} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE TRADE_COMINFO
COMPANYID = #{companyid},
COMPANYNAME = #{companyname},
COMPSHORTNAME = #{compshortname},
COMPANYTYPE = #{companytype},
AREAID = #{areaid},
REGADDRESS = #{regaddress},
ADDRESSID = #{addressid},
ADDRESS = #{address},
ZIPCODE = #{zipcode},
COMPANYTEL = #{companytel},
FAX = #{fax},
FIXFUND = #{fixfund},
LAWER = #{lawer},
LAWERIDCARD = #{laweridcard},
LAWEREMAIL = #{laweremail},
LAWERMOBILEPHONE = #{lawermobilephone},
MANDATARY = #{mandatary},
MANDATARYIDCARD = #{mandataryidcard},
MOBILEPHONE = #{mobilephone},
EMAIL = #{email},
INTRODUCTION = #{introduction},
LASTYEARINCOME = #{lastyearincome},
CHEMICALSRANK = #{chemicalsrank},
CHINESEDRUGSRANKS = #{chinesedrugsranks},
BIOLOGICALPRODUCTRANKS = #{biologicalproductranks},
WARRANTCODE = #{warrantcode},
WARRANDATE = #{warrandate},
BUSINESSLICENCE = #{businesslicence},
BUSINESSDATE = #{businessdate},
COMPANYCODE = #{companycode},
CODEDATE = #{codedate},
ISADEQUATESUPPLY = #{isadequatesupply},
ISDISTRIBUTION = #{isdistribution},
ISCRIME = #{iscrime},
COMPANYREGISTERID = #{companyregisterid},
ADDUSERID = #{adduserid},
ADDTIME = #{addtime},
DISTRIBUTION = #{distribution},
DISAREAID = #{disareaid},
LAWERJOB = #{lawerjob},
LAWERCALL = #{lawercall},
REGCARDCOUNT = #{regcardcount},
DRUGCOUNT = #{drugcount},
TPTALASSETS = #{tptalassets},
FIXEDASSETS = #{fixedassets},
GSPCODE = #{gspcode},
GSPENDTIME = #{gspendtime},
ISSECULARLICENCE = #{issecularlicence},
ISJLY = #{isjly},
ISBUSINESSLICENCE = #{isbusinesslicence},
CREDITCODE = #{creditcode},
REPORTDATE = #{reportdate},
LASTYEARTOTAL = #{lastyeartotal},
ISNWKT = #{isnwkt},
ISPFT = #{ispft},
COMPANYEMERGENCYTEL = #{companyemergencytel},
VARIETYNUMBER = #{varietynumber},
PRODUCTGAUGE = #{productgauge},
WINVARIETYNUMBER = #{winvarietynumber},
WINPRODUCTGAUGE = #{winproductgauge},
WAREHOUSEAREA = #{warehousearea},
ISWON = #{iswon},
PICKINGSYSTEM = #{pickingsystem},
COMPUTERSYSTEM = #{computersystem},
INVENTORYSYSTEM = #{inventorysystem},
PLATFORMDOCKING = #{platformdocking},
LASTYEARBUSINESSINCOME = #{lastyearbusinessincome},
VIOLATIONSTATEMENT = #{violationstatement},
COMCRITICALTEL = #{comcriticaltel},
MANDATARYCRITICALTEL = #{mandatarycriticaltel},
ISUSING = #{isusing},
COMPANYCATEGORY = #{companycategory},
BUSINESSSCOPE = #{businessscope},
ISCREDITCODE = #{iscreditcode},
TRCID = #{trcid},
BUSINESSLICENSEID = #{businesslicenseid},
ISUSINGREASON = #{isusingreason},
ISCHANGENAME = #{ischangename},
BEFORENAME = #{beforename},
ISGENERALAGREEMENT = #{isgeneralagreement},
COMPANYIDOLD = #{companyidold},
COMPANYID_SC = #{companyidSc},
COMPANYNAME_SC = #{companynameSc},
BUSINESSLICENCEIMG = #{businesslicenceimg},
WARRANTIMG = #{warrantimg},
AUTHORIZATIONIMG = #{authorizationimg},
GSPIMG = #{gspimg},
OTHERINFORMATION = #{otherinformation},
ISFIVEONE = #{isfiveone},
FIVECODE = #{fivecode},
ISSCDIS = #{isscdis},
NSSBH = #{nssbh},
ISYQ = #{isyq},
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT ,C.LASTUPDATETIME FROM TRADE_COMINFO T LEFT JOIN ( SELECT L.DATAID,MAX(L.CHANGETIME) LASTUPDATETIME FROM SYS_CGCHANGELOG L WHERE L.CHANGETYPE='BASE_COMPANY' GROUP BY L.DATAID) C ON T.ID=C.DATAID
AND t.COMPANYID in(
#{item} )
AND c.LASTUPDATETIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
AND c.LASTUPDATETIME <= TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
ORDER BY C.LASTUPDATETIME ASC, T.COMPANYID
